name: Name
newProjectDescription: Let's get started! Create a project which you can later add new droplets in.
newDockDescription: Launch a dock. Fill out a few details, pick a theme, and deploy your web app!
dockDescription: What is your dock all about?
settingsPageDescription: Here you can adjust your account settings.
profilePageDescription: Overview of your settings, support, security and everything else.
generalPageDescription: Adjust or change anything in your account.
contactDetailsPageDescription: Fill in the blanks and make your information up to date.
languagePageDescription: 你好, Привет, Hola, Hello, go with what suits you the best.
marketingPageDescription: Decide how you'd like to receive marketing from us.
verifiedEmailsPageDescription: Verify your email to activate more features.
chatBotPageDescription: Speak with our AI chatbot, it's always learning how to serve you better.
chatPageDescription: Chat with our agents for any question you may have.
securityAndPrivacyPageDescription: We care deeply about your security and privacy, choose the way you want to share your data.
supportPageDescription: We're always trying assist with helpful information 24/7, feel free to reach out to us for any questions.
generalSupportPageDescription: Call us or send us an email for any help you need.
termsOfServicePageDescription: Our terms for how you use Sailsdock.
deleteAccountPageDescription: We're sorry to see you go and hope you'll give us another chance in the future.
deletionDescription: Please feel free to give us a feedback about what we couldn't deliver on.
webappModel: Choose a model for your dock
themes: Choose one theme you want for your dock
defaultProjectDescription: Resources created without a designated project will be added to your default.
deleteProjectDescription: To delete a project, you must move or delete all resources within it. Default Project cannot be deleted.
